channel.title: ELP Television
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ashtabula-Area Media
channel.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
channel.itunes:summary: The renegade television network offering the Ashtabula area public domain and Creative Commons-licensed content from the Internet Archive in addition to locally produced shows.
channel.description: The renegade television network offering the Ashtabula area public domain and Creative Commons-licensed content from the Internet Archive in addition to locally produced shows.
channel.itunes:keywords: video on demand, Ashtabula, special services

item.title: Making Films That Teach
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Making Films That Teach
item.itunes:summary: An educational film about making educational films. In an age where everybody can post video online there is a need for good instructional video content.
item.description:
An educational film about making educational films. In an age where everybody can post video online there is a need for good instructional video content.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/MakingFilms.html.

item.description:
NASA history file film about its Wallops Island launch facility.

item.title: Using the Bank
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Using the Bank
item.itunes:summary: A look at relatively ancient banking practices from the middle of the 20th century.
item.description:
A look at relatively ancient banking practices from the middle of the 20th century.

item.title: Shake Hands With Danger
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Shake Hands With Danger
item.itunes:summary: Marked EXPLICIT due to simulated construction site and workplace accidents and simulated gore. This is a 1970s training film produced for Caterpillar Tractor Company with quite the guitar track showing what not to do on a job site.
item.description:
Marked EXPLICIT due to simulated construction site and workplace accidents and simulated gore. This is a 1970s training film produced for Caterpillar Tractor Company with quite the guitar track showing what not to do on a job site.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/ShakeHands.html.

item.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
item.itunes:summary: For Halloween we have a silent film. Yes, we turn to an early film by Universal that does a send-up of a Jules Verne story. The story originally came out towards the end of the Second Empire in France and the launch of the Third Republic.
item.description:
For Halloween we have a silent film. Yes, we turn to an early film by Universal that does a send-up of a Jules Verne story. The story originally came out towards the end of the Second Empire in France and the launch of the Third Republic.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/Halloween2021.html.

item.title: Nancy Drew...Reporter
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Nancy Drew...Reporter
item.itunes:summary: A 1930s era film featuring Bonita Granville as Nancy Drew. No, it is nothing like what is seen on the CW today. Please bear in mind that it is also very much a product of the time when it was produced and may seem quite offensive at points today.
item.description:
A 1930s era film featuring Bonita Granville as Nancy Drew. No, it is nothing like what is seen on the CW today. Please bear in mind that it is also very much a product of the time when it was produced and may seem quite offensive at points today.
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/Drew.html.

item.title: Rocky Jones, Space Ranger -- Crash of the Moons
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Rocky Jones, Space Ranger -- Crash of the Moons
item.itunes:summary: Switching gears with this pick, we wind up turning to Rocky Jones. This is a glimpse at a future that never was. The concept of a Secretary of Space is kinda nice and perhaps we may end up adopting that some day in our own timeline. This is a 1950s retro romp through the galaxy so prepare for blast off!
item.description:
Switching gears with this pick, we wind up turning to Rocky Jones. This is a glimpse at a future that never was. The concept of a Secretary of Space is kinda nice and perhaps we may end up adopting that some day in our own timeline. This is a 1950s retro romp through the galaxy so prepare for blast off!
Show Notes Available at https://coyote.works/2021/RockyJones.html.
